en: As well as a personal sense of wellbeing, based on Gallup polls in each country, the happiness score takes account of GDP, social support, personal freedom and levels of corruption.

en: This year the authors also used data from social media to compare people's emotions before and after the Covid-19 pandemic.
xho: Kulo nyaka ababhali basebenzise ulwazi oluvela kwimithombo yeendaba zentlalo ukuthelekisa iimvakalelo zabantu ngaphambi nasemva kwesifo sikazwelonke i-Covid-19.
